externalInformation.information: (The Buccleuch Living Heritage Trust (registered charity number SC014915) was established in 2010 to support the advancement of historic, artistic, architectural and aesthetic education. It was created from two existing charities, established in the 1980s by the Buccleuch family: The Buccleuch Heritage Trust and The Living Landscape Trust; The Trust owns Dalkeith Palace in Midlothian and leases two of the Buccleuch family homes and their surrounding gardens: Boughton House, based in Northamptonshire and Bowhill House in the Scottish Borders; Principal office: Weatherhouse, Bowhill, Selkirk, TD7 5ES)
